utf8_file.txt.text:
UTF-8 Text File Test
This file contains various international characters:
• English: Hello World
• Spanish: Hola Mundo (ñ, á, é, í, ó, ú)
• French: Bonjour le Monde (é, è, à, ç)
• German: Hallo Welt (ü, ö, ä, ß)
• Chinese: 你好世界
• Japanese: こんにちは世界
• Russian: Привет мир
• Arabic: مرحبا بالعالم

Special characters and symbols:
© ® ™ € £ ¥ § ¶ † ‡ • … ‰ ′ ″
Mathematical: ∑ ∏ ∂ ∆ ∇ ∞ ∫ √ ≈ ≠ ≤ ≥ ± ∓

This should be readable with UTF-8 encoding.

README.txt.text: Test ESL submission with mixed encodings

cp1252_file.txt.text:
CP1252 Test File
This file contains Windows-1252 characters:
French: café, résumé, naïve
Spanish: niño, año, señor  
German: größer, weiß
English quotes: "Hello" 'World'
Dashes: – — 
Currency: € £ ¢
Trademark: © ® ™

This file is encoded in CP1252 (Windows-1252).

latin1_file.txt.text:
Latin-1 Test File
This file contains Western European characters:
French: café, résumé, naïve
Spanish: niño, año, señor  
German: größer, weiß
Portuguese: João, coração, ação
Italian: perché, così, più

Special characters: àáâãäåæçèéêëìíîïñòóôõöøùúûüý
This file is encoded in Latin-1 (ISO-8859-1).
